susanna_and_patch: I really hate it when people say that having Asperger's/autism is a superpower when it makes life incredibly difficult for many people. I hear it all the time and really don't agree. I have Asperger's and could never, ever go on one of those strikes/ be in a crowd/travel around the world, make speeches in front of millions of people or to be honest do much at all outside of my routine because of it. For me and many other people having Asperger's is just really hard and not a positive thing. Seeing the world differently and having a lot of struggles around humans isn't something I think is exactly positive- for me it makes life a lot harder. I'm glad that some people with Asperger's like Greta feel differently though but it really isn't a positive for everyone.😔
